# Mouse
```{r setup}
library(haemdata)

se <- get_pin("mmu_mrna_2016_2022_GENCODEm28_HLT_qc.rds")

se <- subset(se,
    select = grepl("CML", SummarizedExperiment::colData(se)$project)
)

pca <- pca_se(se)
```

```{r pca_plots}
pca$biplot
pca$pairs_plot
```
```{r pca_corr, fig.height=9, fig.width=8}
pca$correlation_plot
```

```{r transgenes}
plot_transgenes_se(se)
```
